value:
This arcane mark on my hand is now
a part of me. Perhaps this is what
despair made manifest looks like...

The future of this world is drenched
in despair. It is only natural that all
vanity would return to nothingness.

You would do well to remember your
place. The moment I tire of you may
well be your last.

If you wish someone destroyed, do
not hesitate. Swallow your sorrow
and end their miserable existence.

Do you know what the most powerful
weapon is? One that deadens hearts
and smothers all hope?$k$pIt is fear, and it cuts far deeper
than any blade.

I am Robin, vessel of the Fell Dragon.
Speak carefully. The fate of your
friend rests in the palm of my hand.

Allow me to fulfill your destiny. I will
eradicate you from this world so that
not a single trace remains.

The only response to a worm is to
squash it. They do not deserve even
a single drop of sentimentality.
This is...slightly unpleasant.

Give all unto the Fell Dragon. That is
your one and only choice.

This "Robin" is merely a vessel. When
your world is laid waste, you will rue
my true name: Grima, the Fell Dragon.

Why was I given this power? To what
end will I use it? You need not
concern yourself with such matters.$k$pAfter all, a worm like you is only
capable of the most instinctual of
reactions: fear. It is inevitable.$k$pIn the face of absolute power, what
could you feel in the depths of your
heart but total helplessness?$k$pDid you consider this might happen
when summoning me? Or did you
hope that I would simply submit?$k$pLet me be clear: you have no hope
of controlling me. And yet, all is not
lost for you. Not yet.$k$pVow to support my cause, and I may
allow you to harness my strength.
The choice is yours...
Forfeit your life.
Die.
Your arrogance ends here.
I will tear you to shreds.
Impossible...
Now that this new power is mine, none in this land can stand against me.
Hm?! Shall I teach you the meaning of fear?
I fear no human. After all, do you fear the worms beneath your feet?
These clothes are tasteful. I like them.
Devote yourself to me entirely. Only then will I consider lending you my power.
It matters not how much power I obtain... This emptiness in my heart will not be filled.
You still smile at me... Utterly incorrigible.
Oh?
Where is my prey?
Insects to be crushed...
